level.heading: NOTICE OF INTENT TO AWARD A SOLE SOURCE CONTRACT (ยง 27-1304)

level.text: 1304.1 A notice of intent to award a sole source contract shall be published on the OCP Internet for at least ten (10) days prior to contract award if the estimated price is over five thousand dollars ($5,000).
A notice of intent to award a sole source contract shall include:
A copy of the proposed determination and findings required under ยง 404(b) of the Act;
A clear description of the item to be procured;
1304.3 Sole source awards, regardless of dollar value, shall be published in accordance with the provisions in ยง 1305 of this chapter.
